name: Control Planes - Storm Revolution Captain
description:
+++ 48-hour discount! 100% FREE! Come fly with me! +++

“Great Time Killer”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome sound and cool music”
___________________________________

Control Planes is a top iPhone game in which you have to control 2 planes, the blue one and the red one, all at once. The planes are flying in the clouds parallel to each other.
Make sure to avoid the obstacles and collect bonuses. This amazing iPhone game will be a good one to test your attention and responses, helping you make the hemispheres of your mind work together.

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Simple controls
Minimalistic graphics
High scores
Absorbing Game play
